title: Authorizing the commissioner of health to apply for a medicaid reform demonstration waiver
summary: Authorizes the commissioner of health to apply for a medicaid reform demonstration waiver; creates an initiative to provide for a more efficient and effective medicaid services delivery system; sets forth a managed care pilot program and requires reporting to the governor, temporary president of the senate and speaker of the assembly by December 31, 2014.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to authorizing the commissioner of health to apply for a medicaid reform demonstration waiver
